title: Perm Ban?
body: Hello, recently I have been put in 20 min waiting queue which isn't a problem, I understand it as my punishment and I have been getting really good at not leaving games. In games I am very positive or just quiet if there are trolls, so I have not been reported for anything like that. But, I understand that when you leave a game while you are still in 20 min waiting queue, you get blocked for 20 mins, this has happened 3 times. I am curious, will I get perm banned after this? or how many games will I have to leave to get perm banned. I do not plan on leaving games in the future, but it will encourage me more so if I know this information. tysm. {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body: You shouldn't end up getting a perma ban from the leaverbuster system. Were you having any issues that kept causing you to leave games that we could help out while you're here?
Ohh, tysm! That is a relief haha, and not that I know of, my wifi has been causing problems and I think thats the main reason, other wise everything is doing great.
